Records was made possible by a generous grant from the Henry Luce Foundation.New-York Historical SocietyNew-York Historical Society170 Central Park WestNew York, NY 10024 (212) 873-3400This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace 2019-11-27T14:55:40Description is in EnglishDescribing Archives: A Content Standard
New-York Historical Society
Time Inc. Annual Reports
Time, inc.
MS 3009-RG 31
8 Linear feet in 8 record cartons
1922-2016 Time Inc. Annual Reports includes annual reports for Time Inc. and later Time Warner Inc. after the merger in 1989; and annual reports from America Online, Inc. (AOL) sent to the library for use as reference at the time of that merger. These materials are stored offsite and advance notice is required for use. Please contact manuscripts@nyhistory.org prior to your research visit to coordinate access. Keep in mind that it will take up to (5) business days for collections to arrive, and you should plan your research accordingly.
Preferred Citation Note
This record group should be cited as Time Inc. Annual Reports, MS 3009-RG 31, New-York Historical Society.
Provenance
Gift of Time Inc. in 2015.
Related Archival Materials Note
This finding aid relates to just one record group of the Time Inc. Records. For information about the other record groups and for overall information about the archives, please see the Guide to the Time Inc. Records (MS 3009). The Henry Luce Papers (MS 3014) were acquired with the Time Inc. Records. The collection of books acquired with the records are cataloged as the Time Inc. Reference Library.
Processing Information Note
Time Inc. Annual Reports was processed by Holly Deakyne in 2017. Deakyne housed and rearranged the Annual Reports. Deakyne and Samantha Brown created the inventory and other descriptive notes to produce this finding aid. Deakyne added additional materials in 2018.
Use Restrictions
This collection is owned by the New-York Historical Society. Although the N-YHS owns this collection as physical property, the donor specifically retains all copyright and all other proprietary rights which may exist. The copyright law of the United States governs the making of photocopies and protects unpublished materials as well as published materials. Unpublished materials created before January 1, 1978 cannot be quoted in publication without permission of the copyright holder.
Access Restrictions
Open to qualified researchers. Materials are stored offsite and advance notice is required for use.
Arrangement Note
Organized into Time Inc. and America Online, Inc. groups. Time Inc. has two groups in chronological order. The Time Inc. library kept a run of annual reports in binders from 1923 to 1988 and another run of loose annual reports. These have not been combined.
Scope and Contents Note
Time Inc. Annual Reports includes annual reports for Time Inc. and later Time Warner Inc. after the merger in 1989. America Online, Inc. (AOL) includes reports sent to the library for use as reference at the time of that merger. Annual reports may include accompanying financial reports, fact books, or Year in Review books. Gaps in Time Inc. annual reports Annual Reports missing from Time Inc. are 2008 to 2009, 2011 to 2012, and 2014.
Accruals
If annual reports from the missing dates are located, they will be added.
